subject: BIOL
title: Principles of Molecular Biology
description: Prokaryote and eukaryote genome structure and replication; mechanisms of gene expression and regulation. [Note: BIOL 240 is recommended. BIOL 308 is recommended for those wishing a general understanding in molecular biology. Students intending to take several upper year molecular biology courses are advised to take BIOL 308 and BIOL 309 concurrently. BIOL 308 is required as a prerequisite for the following courses: BIOL 331, 403, 428, 431, 434, 438, 441, 442, 448. Offered: F, S]
